A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I suspect JJ and Rian didn't really discuss the plot properly. We still don't know much about Snoke and the Canto Bight sequence didn't need to be in the film. Rey is so OP that it's boring seeing her triumph given that she didn't spend much time gaining her powers. I feel bad for Kylo\, he lost to someone who shouldn't be able to do what he can given the disparity in the years they spent training.
